result.name: A novel ABCA12 frameshift mutation segregates with ichthyosis fetalis in a Polled Hereford calf.
result.description: Screening of all exons of the ABCA12 gene to elucidate the mutation responsible for ichthyosis fetalis in a Polled Hereford calf. The variants were originally reported on the 3-prime strand (C/CC)
